name: raoctober day 15 - "banana"
description:
I, Zinfandel,  have created  this utterly brief experience as an  entry for day 15 of raoctober, following the day's theme,  "banana". I hope you enjoy it.

The up and down arrow keys navigate dialog boxes.  Enter or Escape close dialog boxes. Enter also  selects a choice in dialog boxes if you have the cursor lined up with one.

Once you've decided between [k]eyboard/[m]ouse and [c]olor/[m]onochrome, close the Reconstruction of ZZT information box and press P at the game's title screen to play.

banana.
